resources.string: WallUp
MainActivity
Home
Dashboard
Notifications
NOTE: This app is Open Source hence completely free to use with no Ads at all. Kindly go through our Privacy Policy .
NOTE: Trending Images are updated here everyday around 5.30 AM GMT
New: Photographer\'s collections in their profile.
New: Open unsplash photo links directly in Wallup.
New: Wallup\'s own collections available in the app.
New: Way to let user\'s know about the upcoming updates. No more guessing friends.
New: Shared images will be now saved in Downloads/Wallup/ .
Bug Fixed: Image sharing crash on device running Android 7 & above.
Improvements: Many other bugs fixes & performance improvements.
New: Using machine learning to predict tags for a image (can sometimes give irrelevant results).
New: Using ripple animations for click throughout app.
Improvements: Many other bugs fixes & performance improvements.
\@dawnimpulse
This application features images from Unsplash via their APIs. All images are free to use and share although kindly read Unsplash guidelines / license for the same.
To avoid any misuse of this app, kindly go through the Terms & Conditions.
For any query / help contact me via Twitter or send me a mail on dawnimpulse@gmail.com
